text: Generation Beta (Gen Beta for short) are the demographic group after Generation Alpha. According to researchers and popular media sources, Generation Beta started in 2025 and will continue until 2039. Frankie Remruatdika Zadeng is believed to be the first Generation Beta baby in India, born in Aizawl, Mizoram, India, on January 1, 2025 at 12:03 AM. == References == Category:Generations
title: Generation Beta
